reviews.comments: Agustin es un excelente anfitrion.. El departamento tiene una ubicación en un barrio pimtoresco de Buenos Aires

El departamento luce tal cual las fotos. Es muy cómodo y ubicado en una zona muy linda por su bares y restaurants. A pesar de ello está bastante aislado acústicamente y no me impidió conciliar el sueño. Creo que para jóvenes es una zona ideal.Además es muy segura.Volvería.

La ubicación es muy linda ! 
El departamento es cómodo y más amplio de lo que parece en las fotos. Nos sentimos a gusto. 
Muy recomendable !!
El depto es muy comodo y luminoso! Excelente zona para comar rico!
Excelente departamento en una ubicación espectacular. Agustín un excelente anfitrión. Recomiendo 100%
reviews.response:
Muchas gracias Jorge! espero verte en tu proximo viaje por Bs As!
Saludos :)

reviews.comments:
Excelente atencion de agustin, el barrio es muy lindo y comodo! 
El depto es igual a las fotos y la zona es excelente para salir a comer o divertirse!
Muy recomendable!

El departamento es muy lindo, tal cual se muestra en las fotos. En una de las mejores zonas de la capital rodeado de una gran oferta gastronómica y vida nocturna. Agustín un excelente anfitrión, muy atento y permanentemente intentando que nuestra estadía sea la mejor. Súper recomendable!
reviews.response: Muchas gracias Felipe, fue un gusto recibirlos y espero verlos en su proximo viaje por Bs As. Saludos!!

reviews.comments: Muy buena la atención del anfitrión. El departamento en excelentes condiciones de limpieza y comodidad. Quedamos muy satisfechos. 100% recomendable!

La descripción y fotos del anuncio era tal cual lo que encontramos: un departamento luminoso, funcional, cómodo, con amoblamiento de alta calidad, cálido en su decoración y con una ubicación inmejorable!!.  La atención por parte de sus dueños fue excelente!! en todo momento nos sentimos como en casa!. Es altamente recomendable!! y por supuesto volveríamos a alojarnos en futuras ocasiones.
reviews.response: Muchas Gracias Juliana! fue un placer recibirlos :)

reviews.comments:
El departamento resultó exactamente como se lo ve en las fotos publicadas. Es amplio, luminoso y cómodo.
Martín respondió rápidamente a nuestros mensajes y nos estaba esperando el día de la llegada. 
Por la ubicación, con bares y restaurantes muy cercanos, resultó un poco ruidoso  la noche del sábado, no así la noche del domingo.
Gracias Martín por tú hospitalidad y buena predisposición.

El departamento es hermoso! tal cual las fotos. El barrio tiene muchos bares y restaurantes. Esta cerca del subte. Tanto Agustin como su novia fueron muy amables! nos sentimos como en casa! Volveremos pronto.
reviews.response:
Muchas gracias Nico! Fue un placer recibirlos.
Saludos!!

reviews.comments:
El departamento es un lugar en el que te sentís súper cómodo y como en casa! Anfitrión se ocupa siempre de que todo este ok y en el tenes todo lo que necesitas para disfrutar de la estadía. Esta todo en perfecto estado, limpio y muy bien ambientado. Muy cerca tenes un montón de opciones para comer rico y bares para salir a tomar algo por la noche. 100% recomiendo este depto y el Anfitrión!

Its a very, very nice place! You have everything You need in the apartment to enjoy your Stay. Perfecto location, near you have lots of restaurant and bars! Thank You Agustín everything was great! Will be back!!

Excelente estadía!! 
Sin lugar a dudas el departamento es hermoso, super cómodo y muy bien ubicado. 
Agustín un anfitrión de lujo, muy atento y amable.
Volveré!!

El departamento, muy  cómodo, equipado con lo necesario, limpio, luminoso, tal cual se ve en las fotos. La ubicación excelente y tranquila para caminar, recorrer y cerca de los transportes. Agustín muy amable, excelente anfitrión. A la noche se escuchaba un poco el rumor de los restaurantes y lugares de reunión comunes en ese barrio, pero no nos impidió descansar. Muy bueno todo!!

Hermoso departamento y zona inmejorable. Muy seguro las 24 horas y con todo al alcance de la mano: farmacia, supermercado, bares y restaurantes. Esta cerca de otras localidad muy famosas y turísticas de Buenos Aires, en uber se llega rápido a cualquier lado. Hay transporte cerca y se puede llegar caminando a Palermo Soho. El departamento es igual que en la foto y tiene todas las comodidades. 10 puntos

No hay mejor sensación que el lugar sea igual que en las fotos.
Este es un apartamento muy lindo, acogedor y bien ubicado.
Gracias Agustín por tu hospitalida(URL HIDDEN)
Ubicación perfecta en la mejor zona de Palermo. Zona muy segura toda hora. Amplia variedad de restaurantes y bares en las inmediaciones. Vida nocturna moderada.

El apartamento es precioso y el barrio está muy bien para moverse a cualquier hora. Es un poco ruidoso, por lo cual yo tuve que utilizar tapones para dormir. Mis compañeras de aventuras no necesitaron, así que depende de cuán liviano tengas el sueño.
Gracias por recibirnos Agustín!
reviews.response: Muchas gracias Alejandra!! Fue un placer recibirlas :)

reviews.comments: Agustín es un excelente anfitrión, muy preocupado y cordial. El departamento es tal cual se ve en las fotografía y la ubicación es privilegiada, está en un barrio full ondero y seguro.
reviews.response: Muchas Gracias Iris!! :)

reviews.comments: Muy buena ubicación, central y cerca de bares y restaurants. Muy buen trato del anfitrión intentando que tuviéramos la mejor experiencia!

Tal y como se ve en las fotos, el apartamento es moderno y acogedor. Está situado en una zona de mucha actividad nocturna, se siente un poco de ruido por la noche pero también es
perfecto para salir a cenar y a caminar tarde en la noche.
Está muy bien ubicado, con paradas de colectivo y estaciones del subte cerca hace que sea más fácil recorrer la ciudad. 

El aseo de las toallas del baño pudo haber sido mejor, afortunadamente nosotras llevábamos las nuestras, así que no tuvimos mayores problemas.

Agustín,es un gran anfitrión,  un poco ocupado pero siempre pendiente, sus indicaciones fueron muy útiles. Nuestra estadía no pudo ser mejor! esperamos poder volver pronto.
reviews.response: Muchas gracias Laura, fue un placer recibirlos!! :)

reviews.comments:
La estadía es el depto de Agustín fue muy agradable.  Estupendo anfitrión.  Todo impecable en el departamento que era tal cual la foto, muy luminoso y con todo muy cerca, un supermercado cruzando la calle y justo abajo una exquisita heladería Freddo
Detalles que se agradecen: la cortina de la ducha era nueva, se ve que la cambiaban con cada huésped.
Muy muy recomendable

Nos encontramos en la dirección, con el anfitrión en la hora indicada,  fue muy amable y muy practico todo lo que nos dijo acerca del sector y como movernos.
El apartamento es tal cuál lo muestran las fotos, bonito y nos sentimos siempre muy seguras.
El sector es muy entretenido, un poco de ruido en la noche, pero pudimos dormir y descansar sin problemas.
Lindísimo y bien ubicado, muy recomendado!
Un alojamiento acogedor para una pareja aunque demasiado ruidoso los fines de semana. La atención por parte del anfitrión no fue la deseada, aunque esperemos que fuese un caso puntual.

El apartamento de Agustín es perfecto, está completamente equipado, es amplio y la cama es muy cómoda. Es tal y como aparece en las fotos, incluso parece más grande cuando lo ves en persona. La zona es tranquila y muy segura, tiene muchos restaurantes y muy buenos, así como un supermercado justo delante. En cuanto a Agustín, nos ayudó en todo lo posible, y al recibirnos nos explicó zonas por las que movernos y restaurantes a los que ir. Nos ha encantado Buenos Aires, y si volvemos, sin duda repetiremos en este apartamento. Totalmente recomendable!!

El apartamento es muy bonito y tiene todo lo necesario para pasar unos días. Además está en una zona muy segura y concurrida. La única pega es que al ser una zona concurrida y como nos alojamos durante el fin de semana, había bastante ruido a ciertas horas de la mañana y de la noche, pero no nos impidió dormir.
Agustin es muy amable y nos ayudo con lo que necesitamos.
El departamento es muy bonito y se encuentra en un lugar donde están todos los restaurantes, cafeterías, heladería.  Un lugar muy seguro y está todo a la mano. Me encantó, pase unos días hermosos.

El departamento esta muy bien puesto,muy luminoso y con un lindo balcon y con una buen buena ubicacion.Cercano a las lineas de colectivos y al subterraneo.El problema, siempre uno encuentra algo y que se debe valorar, es el intenso y hasta aveces ensordecedor ruido proveniente de la gente que sale de los locales a las 3,4 ò  5 de la mañana,y si a eso se le agrega los escapes de las motos y de los autos se hace dificil dormir.Por suerte ocurre en general, los viernes y sabados por la noche.

Agustin es todo un profesional pendiente de las personas y el apartamento. El apartamento esta muy bien.  La ubicacion es muy buena  en una zona de mucho miovimiento y segura. Sin duda lo recomendamos ampliamente

Agustín fue muy atento y preocupado. Tuvo la amabilidad de mostrarnos el barrio y darlos consejos de los lugares que visitar. Muy atento siempre a lo que necesitaramos. 

El barrio tiene todo lo que necesitas bares, restaurantes, transporte cerca y supermercados. 

El departamento es hermoso y muy limpio, es tal cual la descripción incluso mejor.
reviews.response: Muchas gracias Claudia, espero verte en tu próximo viaje a Buenos Aires!!

reviews.comments: Un apartamento muy bonito e impecable en Palermo. Agustín nos espero y fue muy amable con recomendaciones y atención para nosotros. Ideal para disfrutar de la vida nocturna de Palermo. Si volvemos a BA lo tendremos presente!!!
reviews.response:
Muchas gracias William, espero verlos en su próximo viaje a Bs As.!
Saludos

reviews.comments: Mi esposa y yo estuvimos 7 días en Buenos Aires en el apartamento de Agustín. Todo funcionó muy bien, el apartamento es muy bonito. Agustín estuvo siempre pendiente de nuestra llegada, siempre disponible y muy amable; nos dio muy buenas recomendaciones de dónde comer y qué visitar. El sector es seguro y hay muchísimas opciones para comer y tomar algo. Queda cerca de una estación de metro que facilita la movilidad y hay un supermercado de lo chinos salva. Quizás lo único molesto es el ruido de los locales en las noches (se soluciona con earplugs). De resto muy bien!
reviews.response:
Muchas gracias Arturo!!
Saludos!

reviews.comments: Todo perfecto, buena ubicacion. Muy comodo el departamento!

Nuestro viaje fue perfecto gracias a la estadia perfecta! Nos sentimos seguros y confiantes. El departamento es acogedor, amplio, limpio, decoración despojada y moderna. La calefacción y la internet funcionaron perfectamente. La localización es buenisima, Las Cañitas es un lugar muy práctico para qudarse en Bs. As. sin contar los cafés,restaurantes y bares vecinos. Estamos ansiosos por volver, ló recomendamos! Experiencia incríble, excedio las expectativas! Queremos agradecer en especial al anfitrion muy afable y nos ayudo muchisimo. Suceso Agustin!

Excelente apartamento. Muy bien ubicado, limpio, lindo, y amplio (podría albergar 3 personas sin problema). Está rodeado de buenos restaurantes y mini mercados. A 10 minutos del metro (o "subte" como se le llama en Argentina) y a 3 min de los buses (o colectivos). El transporte público es sencillo de utilizar una vez uno lo entiende. Recomiendo (URL HIDDEN) para obtener indicaciones. 

Agustín es un anfitrión de primera, siempre comunicándose con el huésped y es muy, muy atento. 

Recomendadísimo!
reviews.response:
Gracias a vos Pedro fue un gusto recibirte!
Disfruta del resto del viaje!!

reviews.comments:
Agustin es un anfitrión de primera, muy amable  ya agradable en su trato desde antes de nuestra llegada estuvo pendiente de nuestra llegada, nos oriento a los lugares que podíamos visitar, comer y miles de detalles más.
El departamento es muy bonito, con buena decoración, iluminación y comido queda en una zona bonita, segura y con muchos lugares para salir a tomar una bebida en la noche.
Gracias Agustin esperamos volver pronto!
reviews.response: Fue un placer conocerte Berenice!! espero volver a verte!!

reviews.comments: Ubicado en una de las zonas mas atractivas de Buenos Aires, Cañitas, este apartamento está ubicado cerca de restoranes, bares, y el shopping Solar de la Abadia. Agustín es un excelente host y el apartamento nos fue entregado en perfectas condiciones. Muy recomendable. Volveré a alquilarlo de ser posible para el próximo año.
reviews.response: Muchas gracias Manuel! fue un gusto recibirlos, aqui tienes un lugar para cuando decidas volver!! Saludos

reviews.comments: Excelente apartamento muy comodo con todas las comodidades nombradas en la descripcion. Muy bien ubicado con varios restos y bares para poder cenar. El anfitrion , Agustin,  fue excelente en todo momento siempre solucinando todos los inconvenientes que pueden surgir. Muy recomendable la estadia en este apartamento.

Excelente estadia
Agustin es amable, gentil y muy colaborador.
El apartamento es acogedor y esta muy bien ubicado.
Pasamos unos dias geniales.

Great Appartement!! Very spacey and with lots of natural light. Very welll set up and extremely well located!! Everything you need is there. Agustin was of great help too. Thanks for a great stay!

Excellente depto!! Muy espacioso y luminoso. Muy bien puesto (y nuevo) y con una excellente ubicacion! Todo lo que uno necesita esta ahi. Agustin fue de mucha ayuda tambien. Muchas gracias por una gran estadia!

The flat is very near clubs and bars, if you don't feel like feeling asleep with noises, this is maybe not the right place for you. Except that, very clean and confortable. Metro <10min walk, supermarkets and restaurants nearby.

o imóvel, esta excelentemente ubicado, rua cheia de restaurantes, ideal para pessoas jovens.
Apartamento comodo, e a recepção de Agustin, nao poderia ser melhor

Stylish open plan flat located in a buzzy part of town with lots of bars and restaurants, and also close by to various parks and transport links. We loved our stay! Highly recommended. Agustin was a great host too.

Check-in process is great! Agustin was ready to manage the process for me and always communicating.  Apartment is in a great area, close to bars and restaurants.  Noisy on weekends due to the proximity of the apartment to the street and having a lot of restaurants and bars as neighbors
Great Host  nice neighborhood

O apartamento é muito bonito, igualzinho ao que se tem nas fotos, com tudo o que se precisa.

O apartamento fica em Las Cañitas, um bairro cheio de barzinhos e restaurantes para ir. Recomendamos o bar Antares, fica bem próximo e faz ótimas cervejas artesanais.

Agustín foi super atencioso ao nos receber no check in. Infelizmente não pudemoa conversar muito devido a um compromisso já agendado.
reviews.response: Muito obrigado Lucas !!!  :)

reviews.comments:
O apartamento é bem gostoso, organizado e bonito, exatamente como nas fotos! Acomodou 3 pessoas super bem. O bairro é ótimo, muito seguro e charmoso. Durante a noite nos finais de semana a rua pode ser barulhenta pela animação dos bares em volta mas nada que tenha nos atrapalhado!
Obrigada Augustín!
Abraço

O apartamento é muito bonito, bem estruturado, ótima limpeza além da excelente localização. Agustín foi um ótimo anfitrião. Fui muito bem recepcionada e amparada. Fiz uma ótima viagem e só tenho elogios a fazer sobre Agustín e sobre apartamento. Espero voltar em breve!
reviews.response:
Muito obrigado Ana Laura!!  
Abraço :)

reviews.comments: Excelente apartamento, conforme fotografias! Super bem localizado próximo a restaurantes, supermercado e afins. Próximo a uma estação de metrô, e também permite ir caminhando a palermo soho, recoleta e por aí vai!

O apartamento é exatamente como aparece nas fotos. Quando chegamos ao endereço, o Agustin já estava nos aguardando. Nos mostrou o apartamento e fez um mini tour pelas ruas próximas ao apartamento para nos mostrar todas as opções de mercado, bares, restaurantes, etc. Desde a reserva fomos muito bem atendidos por ele! O apartamento é bem localizado e é possivel fazer muitas coisas a pé. O lugar é super seguro!! Amamos nossa viagem a BsAs e super recomendamos esse apto! Pra quem gosta de barzinhos e restaurantes, é perfeito!!!
reviews.response: Muito obrigado Caroline, até a próxima!! :)

reviews.comments: Tudo conforme o anúncio. O bairro é muito bem localizado, próximo ao transporte público, lugares interessantes para se visitar e o apartamento é na mesmo rua de vários bares, pubs e restaurantes muito bons! Quando voltar a Buenos Aires darei preferência a este apartamento.
reviews.response: Muchas gracias Alex!! Espero verte en tu próximo viaje a Bs. As. ! :)

reviews.comments:
Agustín was an amazing host throughout our stay in Buenos Aires. Very helpful and attentive, as well as recommended some great restaurants to visit within the local area. Agustín kindly accommodated us by letting us check in early and booked an early morning cab for the airport on our behalf. 
The apartment itself is great! Very spacious, clean, bright with lots of character. Location wise the neighbourhood felt safe and was a reasonable walk to the tube station which allow us to easily get around Buenos Aires. If you need a simple and convenient base to explore Buenos Aires, I would recommend Agustín and his apartment.
reviews.response: Thank you so much Alejandra, all the best!  :)

reviews.comments: Espaço maravilhoso. O bairro muito agradável e bem localizado. Nosso anfitrião muito atencioso.
reviews.response:
Muito obrigado Daniela!! 
Tudo o melhor para você, até a próxima :)

reviews.comments: Agustín foi um excelente anfitrião. O apartamento é ótimo, com boa localização e bem equipado.
reviews.response:
Muito obrigado Barbara!! 
Tudo o melhor para você :)

reviews.comments: My boyfriend and I had a great stay in this apartment, and I can definitely recommend it! Agustín was very helpful, specially about our check in and check out times. The apartment is spacious, clean and tidy, and has the amenities you need for 2-3 people. The sun deck with a small pool is so nice on hot days, and you are in walking distance of public transport, and lots of restaurants. The area can be noisy at night, but very calm at daytime, and always safe. We enjoyed it very much - thank you Agustín!

Great Neighborhood! Very nice and comfortable Apartment perfect for a couple or two people. The neighborhood has a lot of great restaurants, parks and supermarkets . The metro and bus stations are just a few blocks away. We felt very safe ! Only negative part was the bar downstairs which plays loud music in the night until early in the morning . Gladly we had Oropax:)
Casa confortável e charmosa. Muito bem localizada. Anfitrião muito atencioso.
reviews.response:
Muito obrigado Domingo! 
Eu espero vè-lo em sua próximo viagem por Buenos Aires!! :)

reviews.comments:
Experiência fantástica! 
O apartamento do Agustín é exatamente como nas fotos, ou seja, maravilhoso. Outra coisa importante é a localização. A rua Baéz é movimentada, perto de tudo e há muitos bares e restaurantes pra todos os gostos, uma delícia de lugar, recomendo mil vezes!
Gracias Agustín!
reviews.response:
Muito obrigado Sabrina!
Eu espero vè-lo em sua próximo viagem por Buenos Aires!! :)

reviews.comments: O local é maravilhoso! Exatamente como descrito, um lugar movimentado, porém seguro, cheio de parques e muito gostoso para ir com a família como foi meu caso. Apartamento bem estruturado e lindo, adorei mesmo. O Agustin é muito simpático e gentil, parabéns!!
reviews.response: Muchas Gracias Emanuelle!! :)

reviews.comments: Great little studio apartment, very clean, just like in the photos. Very well equipped - fantastic kitchen. Close to a couple of metro/train stations and plenty of bus routes. A number of small supermarkets close by as well for self caterers. Noisy at nights as others have pointed out, but apart from that a great place to stay in BA, some really nice restaurants (and icecream parlours!) in the street below.

It is a good location can be noisy at night but in general it was ok.   I recommend this apartment for short stayed.
Agustin very nice hosted.

We enjoyed our time here. Agustin gave us good tips on arrival and was very responsive when a blind broke during our stay. It's well located between a Subte and railway station and there are lots of restaurants in the neighbourhood. This was both a plus and minus as it meant there was also a lot of noise some nights, all through the night, which made sleeping a struggle for us as light sleepers. The apartment was nicely laid out and set up.

This AirBnB was just OK for us.   This area of the city was good.  The studio was fairly comfortable and we used the kitchen a lot.  But too many little things were “off” for us - and so, we’d probably not return.   If you do book, be aware that the club next door is open till 1:30am and most nights, we heard music and patrons leaving very late.

We had wonderful days in Buenos Aires and the apartment was perfect for us. The district is very nice and safe. The street is a bit noisy during the night, but this does not chaunge our opinion about this place. Augustin was very nice to us, friendly and welcoming.

O apartamento do Agustin é lindo e fica em bairro tranquilo e cheio de comércio, restaurante! Apesar de ser um bairro mais agitado à noite, para mim e minha irmã não teve nenhum inconveniente! Além disso o fato de ter várias linhas de ônibus e um metro bem perto,  nos ajudou a conhecer várias partes de Buenos Aires...  E fica perto dos bosques de Palermo e de parques belíssimos. O apartamento é igual ao da foto e super aconchegante! Recomendo para todos!
Agustin made sure to tell us what we needed to know about the neighborhood, restaurants, getting around, etc. He speaks English, too.
A Nice flat but it is a pity we had no contact with Augustin.

Un très bel appartement, bien situé et propre ! Agustin est tout à fait joignable et à l'écoute. La rue est parfois un peu bruyante le soir mais ça n'enlève rien au confort qu'offre  le logement. Je le recommande !

Agustin is a great host, he's a true gentleman. He provided lots of good advice on regards to restaurants, transportation and the area. The apartment is in one of the best and safest locations of Buenos Aires. Lots of restaurants and bars in the area. You have a small market right in front and a great coffeeshop in the corner. Friday and Saturday night gets loud on the street, but during daytime and overall is very quiet. The apartment looks bigger in person than the pictures. Extremely convenient location. We spent 4 nights there and the apartment was very comfortable for our family of 3.
reviews.response: Gracias Angie, fue un placer recibirlos!! :)

reviews.comments: O apartamento é exatamente como mostrado nas fotos, ou seja, claro, ensolarado, bonito e aconhegante. Fomos muito bem recebidas pelo Agustin, sempre muito atencioso e solícito. O bairro e a rua são sensacionais. Fica perto de tudo. Recomendo de olhos fechados. Certamente será meu ponto "fixo" sempre que for a Buenos Aires.
reviews.response: Taitiana muito obrigado !!!  :)

reviews.comments: Lovely place, everything was as pictured. Very comfortable! Host was wonderful, lots of suggestions, very helpful! No problems. Easy key exchange! Hair dryer in the unit is awesome! Thank goodness.

Agustin was very accommodating and let me check-in early and let me stay late on the check-out date.  The apartment was great and had everything I needed.  It's in a great location with many restaurants within walking distance, as well as coffee shops and gelato.  I wouldn't hesitate to stay here again the next time I'm in BsAs.

Un très beau séjour dans la ville de Buenos Aires. L'appartement est très agréable et très bien équipé. Il est très confortable situé au coeur d'un quartier très vivant. Beaucoup de restaurants et très proche du métro et des bus. 
Augustin est un hote très soucieux des voyageurs. Il est très disponible pour résoudre les petits soucis qui peuvent subvenir. 
Je recommande fortement l'appartement d'Augustin. C'est avec plaisir que j'y retournerai.

We were welcomed upon arrival by Agustin, and he provided us with lots of tips on places to go, things to see.  We spent most of our time in the barrio where we stayed, sitting out on the terrace watching people and enjoying the cool breeze.  Such a nice place!  Restaurants everywhere!  Be sure to walk to the rose garden!  Highly recommend this home!

Agustin's friend was there to meet us. Our arrival time changed so he was not able to come himself. His friend could have had more relevant information available, or he could have sent it by email or left in a folder or handbook.  
Apartment is as described, basics provided.
Location good, if you are looking for bars, restaurants, nightlife, but this means it is very noisy at night - until 5 am on weekend nights.
Metro station about 15 minutes walk away, buses about ten minutes. 
Small grocery shop across the road. Restaurants, bars on the corner.
Agustin的公寓非常舒适,自由的空间,厨具齐备,适合吃货们自己烹饪,享受乐趣。出行交通也非常方便,离国内机场很近,到国际机场45~60分钟车程。楼下超市和餐厅选择很多,非常方便。Agustin 很细心周到,我们离开的当日还为我们预订计程车。我分享到朋友圈的公寓图片,朋友们都超赞。值得100%推荐!

A estadia foi excelente. Agustin é um ótimo anfitrião, nos ajudou com todas as informações necessárias e deu ótimas dicas de restaurantes e lugares perto do apartamento. O apartamento fica muito bem localizado com uma enorme quantidade de restaurantes, sorveterias e passeios por perto.

Augustin is a very nice host, we met in front of the apartment and he just showed me the neighbourhood, where the hot spots are etc. the apartment is really good as well. You get what you see on the pictures! We stayed there for 4 nights. 
So I definitly can recommend this lovely place!
Great apartment in lovely location. Lots of nice restaurants and bars around and easy to get to subway. Agustin was very helpful and a great host.

Augustin has been an excellent host. He warmly welcomed us at the flat at the proposed time and gave us excellent recommendations to all the various things to do in BA. He was very forthcoming making taxi reservation etc.
The flat is exactly as described and is in a perfect location to explore BA. Public transport is close by and the neighbourhood is full of restaurants, cafes and clubs.
Argentinian nights a long and also loud, which you should not mind coming to an "in-location"
Good location

Agustin é um excelente anfitrião. Sempre disponível e pronto para ajudar. Nossa estadia foi extremamente agradável. O apartamento é lindo, muito bem localizado, bem equipado, perto dos parques de Palermo, do metrô e do trem. Fica num pedaço de Palermo chamado Las Cañitas, que conta com ótimos restaurantes e agitada vida noturna. Fomos com nosso filho de quase dois anos e Agustin nos mostrou playgrounds no bairro. Voltaremos a nos hospedar lá certamente!

The accommodation made our Buenos Aires experience even more enjoyable. Agustin was flexible to meet us at the hour of our arrival, and very helpful throughout our stay with general advice for the city. The apartment was excellent, clean, modern, with a lot of light and located in a fantastic and safe area with many great restaurants just around the corner.

Agustin was an amazing host who was very good at being in communication at all times from the beginning to the end of my stay. He offered tons of suggestions for things to do, food, and entertainment.

The apartment is gorgeous with a beautiful patio where you can chill and enjoy the ambiance of the streets of Palermo. It's clean and spacious and modern. A perfect place for either a couple or friends traveling together or even someone traveling solo. I will definitely consider staying here again in the future.

prior to our arrival we had limited contact with agustin, but he said he would meet us at his apartment, and was there when we arrived. the apartment is sunny, clean, and simply laid out- as evident from the photos, and quite large enough for two people. agustin explained to us the economic challenges of living with economic ups and downs, so we were able to transfer dollars from our home accounts to be deposited at pesos in argentina at a reasonable rate.  very useful information. he also helped us to make the most of our experience in buenos aires. we tend to be pretty independent travelers, walked and used bus system widely during the day. one evening we did take a cab to a music club, but that and cabs to and from the airport were the only exceptions. we felt entirely safe in this neighborhood at all times, and had no anxious moments. we ate breakfasts in and had leftovers of dinner for most lunches.

Great location and great host. 
We were welcomed by Augustin and he walked is us through the studio. No separate rooms but the separation curtain works well and you have some privacy. There is a balcony where to can eat and drink. Had issues with the door lock but this was fixed in the next hour. Very helpful and always available of needed. Also provides great information on where to eat and go out in the neighborhood. This neighborhood has everything. Walking distance to the underground which brings you straight to the city center. Taxi go by all day long

You must know that this is a busy street on weekends so as the room gives on the street this is not for light sleepers. But this is for weekends as I am sure week nights are silent. 

Overall a great place to discover the city and looks like in the pictures

Agustín is a fantastic host - really easy to get hold of before and during the trip and full of tips on local restaurants, sights to see and any other questions we had! The apartment itself is bright and clean, exactly like the photos. The location is great, close to the subway and near lots of bars and restaurants (though can get a bit noisy at weekends, something for light sleepers to bear in mind!). There's also a little balcony for breakfast or a pre-dinner drink! I really recommend Augustín's apartment as a base for exploring Buenos Aires - we had a really great time.
reviews.response: Thank you very much Paula :), all the best for you!

reviews.comments: Agustin's place is a wonderful home base to experience Buenos Aires. The location is bang in the middle of the Palermo neighborhood, literally steps away from some of the greatest dining in town. It's well connected with frequent taxis coming down the street, and close to a subway station. There is a grocery store right across the street for essentials. Agustin is a kind, considerate, and accommodating host (with a wonderful family). We loved the apartment and the city, and would highly recommend to anyone headed to Bs As.
reviews.response: Thank you very much Papi, all the best for you!  :)

reviews.comments: Agustin's friend greeted us when we arrived in BA .We could contact Agustin at any point for information .The apartment was very clean and homely.The neighbourhood was fantastic. The locals were very friendly and helpful.
reviews.response: Thank you very much Noeleen, all the best for you!

reviews.comments: Agustin was an amazing host. We arrived and he kindly prepared everything for us. It was impeccable. He also gave us great tips about what to do in Buenos Aires and what restaurants to go to. Thank you Agustin!!!
reviews.response: Gracias Nicole, fue un gusto recibirlos!

reviews.comments: Fomos na segunda semana de julho e estamos sem palavras para escrever a nossa estadia , tudo estava impecável e Agustin é um excelente anfitrião , o apartamento é lindo , exatamente como nas fotos , Agustin nos mostrou tudo direitinho e nos mostrou o bairro (URL HIDDEN) certeza na próxima vez que formos para Buenos Aires iremos nos hospedar em um dos seus apartamentos .
reviews.response: Muito obrigado Gabriela, tudo o melhor para você!!

reviews.comments: Agustin é um excelente anfitrião. I loved the place, very cosy!!!
reviews.response:
Muchas gracias Gabriel!! 
Espero verte en tu próximo viaje a Buenos Aires.

reviews.comments:
Agustin was an incredible host. He was there waiting for us with keys to the apartment and gave us a quick tour of the neighborhood. The apartment was beautiful and exactly how it looks in the pictures. Agustin even went as far as to reach out to us every few days to see if we had any questions or needed any help. 
The neighborhood is really safe and beautiful and having this as a home base was fantastic for our trip! I don't think that our host or apartment could have been any better, this is a 5 out of 5!
reviews.response: Thank you very much Dan, all the best for you!

reviews.comments: Apartamento muito bem localizado, limpo, arejado e amplo! Agustin muito atencioso e prestativo. Sem dúvidas voltarei a me hospedar nesse apartamento.
reviews.response:
Muito obrigado Gabriel!!
Los espero en su próximo viaje :)

reviews.comments: We enjoyed our stay in Augustin's apartment. We are visiting Buenos Aires for the first time and he was very patient in answering lot of questions about the city before we arrived at his apartment. He showed us around the restaurants, bars in the neighborhood, gave tips about where to go in Buenos Aires, how to travel around in the city. He was readily available by phone  for any questions I had about the neighborhood or the city. The pictures on airbnb are very accurate and the apartment is beautiful and super clean. The apartment has good ventilation and is decorated very well.  If you like to try lot of good restaurants & bars, this is the place to be.  Neighborhood  feels very safe and metro is  pretty close which is nice.
reviews.response: Thank you very much Karthik, all the best for you!  :)

reviews.comments:
FIRST OF ALL - EVERYTHING YOU CAN READ FROM OTHER CLIENTS IS CORRECT :-)!!!
The apartment is very clean and tidy, the location is perfect because you are well connected to the city with the underground but you also find a lot of interesting and good restaurants around the corner. Not a single moment I did not feel safe in Palermo - even at night!
I enjoyed a lot breakfast in the sun on the balcony and also a cool sun downer on top of the building at the swimming pool. 
At the beginning I was a bit worried because I could not reach Agustin by telephone or SMS. But it turned out that these services do not work well all the time in Argentina - so we changed our communication to Airbnb. 
When we met I felt immediately great sympathy for Agustin - he is a great guy and tries to help wherever he can - he even offered me a transfer to the airport (which for sure is not near)!
Knowing that he will be father of a little girl very soon I wish him and his family all the best for the future and I understand that travelling will not be easy in the near future. But he likes to see other countries and when the time of travelling comes again it will be my pleasure to support him during his stay in Vienna!
Thank you very much Agustin and all the best
Jochen

The apartment is in a perfect location - walking distance to subte and amazing restaurants (of all different varieties) on the doorstep.  There is a very convenient off license/shop opposite and an ice creamery underneath. It was noisy on Saturday night due to proximity of bars etc, but it shouldn't stop you staying here.
The apartment itself was impeccably clean, bright and safe.  Even includes a safe for your valuables!  The balcony was a perfect place to end a stay of sightseeing and have a drink before heading out for a late dinner!
Agustin was the absolute perfect host, he took the time not only to show us around the apartment but also the local area with good tips on restaurants and bars, also happy to help book taxis etc and contactable via (SENSITIVE CONTENTS HIDDEN) at any time. We're so glad we decided to stay here - it was the perfect start to our Argentine vacation!!
reviews.response: Thank you very much Tasha, all the best for you!

reviews.comments: Excelente opção para quem quer ficar perto de bons bares e restaurantes. O apartamento é muito bem localizado, confortável, agradável e é exatamente como aparece nas fotos: lindo! Agustin é um excelente anfitrião: nos recebeu depois de meia-noite, nos passou várias dicas de programação e estava sempre disponível para nos ajudar quando lhe escrevia perguntando alguma coisa. Recomendo muito o apartamento e certamente voltarei a me hospedar lá.
reviews.response:
Muito obrigado Paula!! 
Para quando você quer viajar já sabe que tem a sua casa aquí em Buenos Aires!

reviews.comments: Meget venlig modtagelse af Agustin. Vi fik en fin introduktion af lejlighed, som er meget ren, lys og velfungerende og ligger i et roligt hyggeligt område med dejlige restauranter.
reviews.response:
Charlotte thank you very much!
Greetings to Jørgen :)
